item.title: How to make my member system work right
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

public void mbuy() { if (playerIsMember > 0) { sendMessage("You're already a member!"); return; } if (!playerHasItemAmount(995, 500000)) { sendMessage("You don't have enough money to purchase membership!"); return; } deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 500000); playerIsMember++; sendMessage("You have just purchased membership!"); sendMessage("You now have access to new member quests, skills, and items!"); }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make my member system work right

item.title: How to make my member system work right
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

this is my member system i want it to be able to make you pay 500k but it doesnt it just gives it to you no matter how much money you have can anyone help; code:

[code]public void mbuy(){
if (playerIsMember == 0){
if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 500000)== true) {
playerIsMember ++;
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 500000);
sendMessage(“You have just bought a membership”);
sendMessage(“Now you can do many member quest, skills, and wear members items!”);

    } else {
          if (playerIsMember == 0){
        if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 500000) == false) {
      sendMessage("Sorry you don't have enough money");

       }
             if(playerIsMember == 1)
               sendMessage("you are already a member please do not abuse this system"); 
      }
  }

}
}[/code]
this make you able to buy it when you dont have enough money can anyone help me the ! operation doesnt work already went to that

Read full topic
item.source: How to make my member system work right
